TEXT.TITLE: BELL SOUTH <BLS> UNIT GETS DIGITAL CUSTOMERS
TEXT.BODY: Bell South Corp's Southern Bell said American Telephone and Telegraph Co's <T> network systems and <Hayes Microcomputer Products> will use its integrated services digital network services when the product is launched in March 1988. Reuter
